716431f-a.text:
19, 21, 23, 25, 27 Bank Street, north side, between Greenwich Avenue and 4th Street.
No. 21 is the Christian Reformed Church.  Although this was erected as recently as 1895, it is already about to be abandoned, and will be used in the 1930's by theatrical companies and political clubs.

March 19, 1929

P.L. Sperr.
716431f-a.folder: Bank Street & Greenwich Avenue, Manhattan, NY
